{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = ThinkPad 2x2 a/b/g/n Wireless LAN PCI Express Half Mini Card Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Gemtek |model = WMIB-275N |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = (Lenovo) |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = March 29, 2011 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Gemtek_WMIB-275N_(Lenovo) |sernum = |wlclass = N300 |series = |if = Mini PCIe |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = (half) |vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 0576 |subvendor_id = |subdevice_id = |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1041 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = AC:81:12 |chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43224; |chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/02/2009 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This is '''[[Lenovo]]''' FRU 60Y3251. This device is used in the following laptops.. *Thinkpad X120e **OUI AC:81:12 *Thinkpad X130e (per the service manual for the device) The 14e4:0576 PCI ID appears to be vendor specific. ===lspci -nnv dump=== 
05:00.0 Network controller [0280]: Broadcom Corporation BCM43224 802.11a/b/g/n [14e4:0576] (rev 01)
        Subsystem: Broadcom Corporation BCM43224 802.11a/b/g/n [14e4:0576]
        Physical Slot: 1
        Flags: bus master, fast devsel, latency 0, IRQ 19
        Memory at f1d00000 (64-bit, non-prefetchable) [size=16K]
        Capabilities: [40] Power Management version 3
        Capabilities: [58] Vendor Specific Information: Len=78 
        Capabilities: [48] MSI: Enable- Count=1/1 Maskable- 64bit+
        Capabilities: [d0] Express Endpoint, MSI 00
        Capabilities: [100] Advanced Error Reporting
        Capabilities: [13c] Virtual Channel
        Capabilities: [160] Device Serial Number 00-00-12-ff-ff-3e-ac-81
        Capabilities: [16c] Power Budgeting 
        Kernel driver in use: bcma-pci-bridge
